sentences.en: 5,000 people die every year because of accidents in the home.
sentences.cn: 每年有5,000人死于家中的意外事故。

sentences.en: A new study proved conclusively that smokers die younger than non-smokers.
sentences.cn: 一项新的研究确证了吸烟者比不吸烟者死得早。

sentences.en: At best Nella would be an invalid; at worst she would die.
sentences.cn: 内拉往好里说会落下残疾，往坏处说可能会生命不保。

sentences.en: Contrary to the more alarmist reports, he is not going to die.
sentences.cn: 那些更加危言耸听的报道说他生命垂危，但事实并非如此。

sentences.en: Half a million women die needlessly each year during childbirth.
sentences.cn: 每年有50万女性难产致死是本可避免的。

sentences.en: He did die a pauper and is buried in an unmarked grave.
sentences.cn: 他死的时候一文不名，葬在一处无名墓穴中。

sentences.en: He died in 1985 at the age of 76.
sentences.cn: 他1985年去世，终年76岁。

sentences.en: He knew that under the surgeon's knife he would surely die.
sentences.cn: 他知道他必定会死在外科医生刀下.

sentences.en: Her father died suddenly in an accident when she was only ten.
sentences.cn: 她年仅10岁时父亲突然死于一场意外事故。

sentences.en: If the soil is allowed to dry out the tree could die.
sentences.cn: 如果任由土壤变干，这棵树可能会枯死。

sentences.en: It is better to die oneself than to kill.
sentences.cn: 宁可自亡，不可行凶。

sentences.en: Lung cells die and are replaced about once a week.
sentences.cn: 肺细胞约每周新老更替一次。

sentences.en: Our love will never die.
sentences.cn: 我们的爱始终不渝。

sentences.en: She died peacefully in her sleep at the age of 98.
sentences.cn: 她在睡眠中安然辞世，享年98岁。

sentences.en: She refuses to see her beloved boy die in such dishonor.
sentences.cn: 她不愿看到她深爱的男友就这样不名誉地死去。

sentences.en: The bullet went straight through his head, and he died instantly .
sentences.cn: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

sentences.en: The bullet went straight through his head, and he died instantly.
sentences.cn: 子弹穿过他的头部，他当场死亡。

sentences.en: The moment had come to make a break or die.
sentences.cn: 那个时候不跑就没命了。

sentences.en: The youngest child, John, was to die at the age of fourteen.
sentences.cn: 最小的孩子约翰后来于14岁时夭亡。

sentences.en: We were worried that she was going to die.
sentences.cn: 我们很担心她快要死了。

sentences.en: You stay here, you die. No two ways about it.
sentences.cn: 你若留在这里，必死无疑。

words.tran_cn: 无生命的；呆板的；废弃了的
致命的；非常的；死一般的
死；死一样的状态；无精打采
死，死亡；枯萎；失去活力（die的ing形式）
变得如死一般；失去活力

phrases.tran_cn: 寿终，因年老(或患病)而死

trans.tran_cn: 死，凋谢，消失，灭亡，停止运行，熄灭
trans.tran_en: to stop living and become dead
